edu.stanford.nlp.mt.train

Class LexicalReorderingFeatureExtractor

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.stanford.nlp.mt.train.AbstractFeatureExtractor
      • edu.stanford.nlp.mt.train.LexicalReorderingFeatureExtractor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FeatureExtractor

    public class LexicalReorderingFeatureExtractor
extends AbstractFeatureExtractor
    Extractor for lexicalized re-ordering probabilities of Moses.
    Author:
    Michel Galley

      • featurizePhrase

        public void featurizePhrase(AlignmentTemplateInstance alTemp,
                   AlignmentGrid alGrid)
        Description copied from class: AbstractFeatureExtractor
        Empty phrase-level feature extractor.
        Specified by:
        featurizePhrase in interface FeatureExtractor
        Overrides:
        featurizePhrase in class AbstractFeatureExtractor
        Parameters:
        alTemp - A particular occurrence of an alignment template.
        alGrid - A two dimensional array, in which each cell (i,j) contains the set of AlignmentTemplateInstance objects that have one of their four corners lying at (i,j) in the alignment grid. Not that if FeatureExtractor.needAlGrid() returns false, alTemps is always null.
